headline: ABT vs. EW: Which Structural Heart Device Stock Is Worth Buying Now?
summary: As the structural heart market expands, Abbott and Edwards battle for leadership. Which stock holds stronger growth momentum now?

headline: Updated ESC/EACTS Guidelines Mark Advancement in Structural Heart Disease Care
summary: MADRID, August 29, 2025--Edwards Lifesciences (NYSE: EW) welcomes the updated ESC/EACTS guidelines for valvular heart disease, which establish a simplified care pathway for all severe aortic stenosis (AS) patients, regardless of symptoms.
